A.title: THE CURIOUS TRAILBLAZER
A.motto: I love finding new ways forward.
A.value: Explorer A embodies curiosity, initiative, and sense-making.
A.desc1: You thrive on discovering uncharted paths, using a compass as your spirit object to navigate with purpose and direction.
A.desc2: The red, triangular hat you wear suggests a sharp, investigative nature.
A.desc3: The vibrant red colour reflects your energetic and enthusiastic approach to exploration, always eager to uncover new possibilities.

B.title: THE EMPATHETIC WANDERER
B.motto: I journey to understand people deeply.
B.value: Explorer B is defined by empathy, listening, and perspective-taking.
B.desc1: Your field journal spirit object symbolizes your thoughtful documentation of experiences and insights.
B.desc2: The blue shaped thought bubbles represents your gentleness, your open-mindedness and your reflective character.
B.desc3: The calming blue hue mirrors your compassionate and introspective nature, fostering trust and understanding.

C.title: THE STRATEGIC NAVIGATOR
C.motto: I bring clarity to messy terrain.
C.value: As Explorer C, you excel in systems thinking, framing problems, and strategy.
C.desc1: Your magnifying glass spirit object highlights your ability to analyse and decipher complex challenges.
C.desc2: The green, tesseract-like shape conveys structure, depth, and precision.
C.desc3: The fresh green color embodies growth and stability, aligning with your methodical and insightful problem-solving skills.

D.title: THE PLAYFUL EXPERIMENTER
D.motto: I learn by trying and doing.
D.value: Explorer D embodies experimentation, play, and iteration.
D.desc1: Your toolbelt spirit object reflects a hands-on, adaptable, and resourceful approach to learning.
D.desc2: The purple, spiky shape demonstrates your creativity, energy, and action.
D.desc3: The dynamic purple hue captures your innovative and playful spirit, always ready to experiment and refine.

E.title: THE VISIONARY PATHFINDER
E.motto: I imagine boldly, act bravely and forge new paths.
E.value: The visionary pathfinder is fueled by imagination, risk-taking, and vision.
E.desc1: Your lantern spirit object symbolizes your role as a guiding light, illuminating new directions.
E.desc2: The orange, flame-like shape radiates your warmth, boldness, and vitality.
E.desc3: The fiery orange colour reflects your courageous and visionary essence, inspiring others to follow your lead.
